nodes.text: A skimmer was a repulsorlift vehicle similar to a skiff. The Aki-Aki farmers of Pasaana used skimmers to travel large distances when planting crops, utilizing models such as the Arunskin 75D skimmer and the HS-19 cargo loading transport skimmer. The sea skiff crafts used by Company 77 on the ocean moon of Kef Bir were also sometimes referred to as skimmers.
